rules_text:
[i](As an Arena enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it converted for free.)[/i]
When this battle enters, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it.
rules_text2: When this enchantment enters, gain control of target tapped creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text2: [i]After a lengthy day of competition, the events festivities are shared and enjoyed by all among the six kingdoms.[/i]
